00022    SpeciesEnsemble::SpeciesEnsemble(Type type)
00023     : mu_(1.0),
00024       type_(type)
00025    {}
00026 
00030    void  SpeciesEnsemble::setMu(double mu)
00031    { 
00032       if (!isGrand()) {
00033          UTIL_THROW("Must be a grand-canonical ensemble");
00034       }
00035       mu_ = mu; 
00036    }
00037 
00041    void SpeciesEnsemble::readParam(std::istream& in)
00042    {
00043       readBegin(in, "SpeciesEnsemble");
00044       read<Type>(in, "type", type_);
00045       if (isGrand()) {
00046          read<double>(in, "mu", mu_); 
00047       }
00048       readEnd(in);
00049    } 
00050 
00051    /* 
00052    * Extract an SpeciesEnsemble::Type from an istream as a string.
00053    */
00054    std::istream& operator>>(std::istream& in, SpeciesEnsemble::Type &type)
00055    {
00056       std::string buffer;
00057       in >> buffer;
00058       if (buffer == "CLOSED" || buffer == "closed") {
00059          type = SpeciesEnsemble::CLOSED;
00060       } else 
00061       if (buffer == "GRAND" || buffer == "grand") {
00062          type = SpeciesEnsemble::GRAND;
00063       } else {
00064          UTIL_THROW("Invalid SpeciesEnsemble::Type value input");
00065       }
00066       return in;
00067    }
00068    
00069    /* 
00070    * Insert a SpeciesEnsemble::Type to an ostream as a string.
00071    */
00072    std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& out, const SpeciesEnsemble::Type &type) 
00073    {
00074       if (type == SpeciesEnsemble::CLOSED) {
00075          out << "closed";
00076       } else 
00077       if (type == SpeciesEnsemble::GRAND) {
00078          out << "grand";
00079       }
00080       return out; 
00081    }

00087    MPI::Datatype MpiTraits<SpeciesEnsemble>::type = MPI::BYTE;
00088    bool MpiTraits<SpeciesEnsemble>::hasType = false;
00089 
00093    MPI::Datatype MpiTraits<SpeciesEnsemble::Type>::type = MPI::INT;
00094    bool MpiTraits<SpeciesEnsemble::Type>::hasType = true;

00100    void SpeciesEnsemble::commitMpiType() 
00101    {
00102       MpiStructBuilder builder;
00103       SpeciesEnsemble   object;
00104 
00105       builder.setBase(&object);
00106       builder.addMember(&object.mu_, MPI::DOUBLE);
00107       builder.addMember(&object.type_, MPI::INT);
00108       builder.commit(MpiTraits<SpeciesEnsemble>::type);
00109       MpiTraits<SpeciesEnsemble>::hasType = true;
00110    }
00111    #endif
00112 
00113 } 
00114 #endif
